creator: GiftYa LLC
descriptionHtml:
GiftYa is the free app that is reinventing gifting! Unlike gift cards that can feel impersonal, get lost or go unused, GiftYa is a beautifully presented, thoughtful and personalized gift that can’t be lost or stolen and doesn’t lose value.

Send a gift for virtually any merchant in the U.S. from top national brands, to local restaurants, online shops and more. Select the amount, then personalize your GiftYa by uploading a photo or video, selecting a pre-designed wrapper and adding a personal message. Next, your GiftYa is delivered to your recipient’s phone within seconds. Or whenever you schedule it for.

Receiving a GiftYa is easy: Link the GiftYa you received to your credit or debit card in seconds, make a purchase at the merchant you were given and your account is credited the amount you spend until the GiftYa is used in full.

Download the app now. GiftYa | The thought that counts.

HOW IT WORKS:

• Sending a GiftYa

Choose from almost any merchant, anywhere, select the amount you want to give, personalize your GiftYa with a photo or video and send it to your recipient’s phone within seconds.

• Receiving a GiftYa

Link the GiftYa you received to your credit or debit card in seconds, make a purchase as you normally would and your account is credited the amount you spend until the GiftYa is used in full.

FEATURES:• Thoughtful gift experience

GiftYa uses the technology that’s part of our everyday lives to send meaningful, personalized gifts in the moment.

• No more unused gift cards

$1 billion in gift cards go unused every year. GiftYa fixes that by linking the gift to the recipient’s credit or debit card so the gift can’t be lost and doesn’t go unused.

Love GiftYa?

Please take a moment to review our app! Your feedback is very important to us. GiftYa | The thought that counts

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Coming Soon: Our new GiftYa Select feature gives recipients the option to use their GiftYa as an eGift Card.

title: GiftYa

creator: GiftYa LLC
descriptionHtml:
The thought that counts!

VIRTUAL GIFTS

From the makers of Giftcards.com, gift sharing has been reinvented to be easier, more personalized, and more thoughtful than ever before! Introducing GiftYa, the gifting app that allows you to send a gift card in a new way. Gift card apps similar to GiftYa often involve buying gift cards that either don’t work or never get sent to the right email. We’ve ensured these annoying problems don’t happen (and never do again!).

With GiftYa, you simply connect your credit/debit card and send gift cards (a GiftYa) to your friends and family through text. Unlike email, which can lead to mistaken identity in delivery, phone numbers are very difficult to get wrong. Once you send someone a GiftYa, they can link it to their credit/debit card in seconds. Once someone purchases with the card they’ve linked, GiftYa credits their account until they’ve spent the total amount in their GiftYa virtual wallet.

The best part? With this method, a GiftYa is usable at ANY business. Now, gift cards aren’t just acceptable at major chains; you can send giftcards for Starbucks or to the small cafe down the road. It’s even more widely accepted than a visa gift card!

SIMPLE GIFTS

It’s the thought that counts. Before, people only bought gift cards for holidays, birthdays, or other special occasions. Now, you can send a GiftYa for as little as $5. Know someone going for a job interview, send them a $5 GiftYa for a cup of coffee with a personalized Good Luck message. It can be used as a simple gift for graduation. Congratulate that new grad with a quick GiftYa for [something clever].

GiftYa does more than just make your e gift card experience easier. It also makes it more meaningful. When you send someone a GiftYa, you can make it a personalized photo gift by including a photo significant to the two of you. Or, send a video with a personalized message that shows how much you care.


HOW IT WORKS:

• Sending a GiftYa

Choose from almost any merchant, anywhere, select the amount you want to give, personalize your GiftYa with a photo or video and send it to your recipient’s phone within seconds.

• Receiving a GiftYa

Link the GiftYa you received to your credit or debit card in seconds, make a purchase as you normally would and your account is credited the amount you spend until the GiftYa is used in full.

FEATURES:• Thoughtful gift experience

GiftYa uses the technology that’s part of our everyday lives to send meaningful, personalized gifts in the moment.

• No more unused gift cards

$1 billion in gift cards go unused every year. GiftYa fixes that by linking the gift to the recipient’s credit or debit card so the gift can’t be lost and doesn’t go unused.

Love GiftYa?

Please take a moment to review our app! Your feedback is very important to us. GiftYa | The thought that counts

DOWNLOAD GiftYa today and become the most thoughtful egifter the world has ever seen!
descriptionShort: Personalized Virtual Gift Cards from the Makers of Giftcards.com

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
GiftYa now supports Virtual Visa and merchant gift exchanges!
Users can now exchange their gift for a Virtual Visa gift card or another merchant of their choice.
GiftYa Select feature that gives recipients the option to use some of their GiftYas as an eGift Card.
ThankYa feature that allows users to thank their GiftYas' senders with a message on Facebook, text, or email.

With GiftYa, you simply connect your credit/debit card and send gift cards (a GiftYa) to your friends and family through text. Unlike email, which can lead to mistaken identity in delivery, phone numbers are very difficult to get wrong. Once you send someone a GiftYa, they can link it to their credit/debit card in seconds. Once someone purchases with the card they’ve linked, GiftYa credits their account until they’ve spent the total amount in their GiftYa virtual wallet.

The best part? With this method, a GiftYa is usable at ANY business. Now, gift cards aren’t just acceptable at major chains; you can send giftcards for Starbucks or to the small cafe down the road. It’s even more widely accepted than a visa gift card!

SIMPLE GIFTS

It’s the thought that counts. Before, people only bought gift cards for holidays, birthdays, or other special occasions. Now, you can send a GiftYa for as little as $5. Know someone going for a job interview, send them a $5 GiftYa for a cup of coffee with a personalized Good Luck message. It can be used as a simple gift for graduation. Congratulate that new grad with a quick GiftYa for [something clever].

GiftYa does more than just make your e gift card experience easier. It also makes it more meaningful. When you send someone a GiftYa, you can make it a personalized photo gift by including a photo significant to the two of you. Or, send a video with a personalized message that shows how much you care.


HOW IT WORKS:

• Sending a GiftYa

Choose from almost any merchant, anywhere, select the amount you want to give, personalize your GiftYa with a photo or video and send it to your recipient’s phone within seconds.

• Receiving a GiftYa

Link the GiftYa you received to your credit or debit card in seconds, make a purchase as you normally would and your account is credited the amount you spend until the GiftYa is used in full.

GiftYa uses the technology that’s part of our everyday lives to send meaningful, personalized gifts in the moment.

• No more unused gift cards

We’ve ensured these annoying problems don’t happen (and never do again!).

With GiftYa, you simply connect your credit/debit card and send gift cards (a GiftYa) to your friends and family through text. Unlike email, which can lead to mistaken identity in delivery, phone numbers are very difficult to get wrong. Once you send someone a GiftYa, they can link it to their credit/debit card in seconds. Once someone purchases with the card they’ve linked, GiftYa credits their account until they’ve spent the total amount in their GiftYa virtual wallet.

The best part? With this method, a GiftYa is usable at ANY business. Now, gift cards aren’t just acceptable at major chains; you can send giftcards for Starbucks or to the small cafe down the road. It’s even more widely accepted than a visa gift card!

SIMPLE GIFTS

It’s the thought that counts. Before, people only bought gift cards for holidays, birthdays, or other special occasions. Now, you can send a GiftYa for as little as $5. Know someone going for a job interview, send them a $5 GiftYa for a cup of coffee with a personalized Good Luck message. It can be used as a simple gift for graduation. Congratulate that new grad with a quick GiftYa for [something clever].

GiftYa does more than just make your e gift card experience easier. It also makes it more meaningful. When you send someone a GiftYa, you can make it a personalized photo gift by including a photo significant to the two of you. Or, send a video with a personalized message that shows how much you care.


HOW IT WORKS:

• Sending a GiftYa

Choose from almost any merchant, anywhere, select the amount you want to give, personalize your GiftYa with a photo or video and send it to your recipient’s phone within seconds.

• Receiving a GiftYa

Link the GiftYa you received to your credit or debit card in seconds, make a purchase as you normally would and your account is credited the amount you spend until the GiftYa is used in full.

FEATURES:• Thoughtful gift experience

GiftYa uses the technology that’s part of our everyday lives to send meaningful, personalized gifts in the moment.

• No more unused gift cards

$1 billion in gift cards go unused every year. GiftYa fixes that by linking the gift to the recipient’s credit or debit card so the gift can’t be lost and doesn’t go unused.

Love GiftYa?

Please take a moment to review our app! Your feedback is very important to us. GiftYa | The thought that counts

DOWNLOAD GiftYa today and become the most thoughtful egifter the world has ever seen!

From the makers of Giftcards.com, gift sharing has been reinvented to be easier, more personalized, and more thoughtful than ever before! Introducing GiftYa, the gifting app that allows you to send a gift card in a new way. Gift card apps similar to GiftYa often involve buying gift cards that either don’t work or never get sent to the right email. We’ve ensured these annoying problems don’t happen (and never do again!).

With GiftYa, you simply connect your credit/debit card and send gift cards (a GiftYa) to your friends and family through text. Unlike email, which can lead to mistaken identity in delivery, phone numbers are very difficult to get wrong. Once you send someone a GiftYa, they can link it to their credit/debit card in seconds. Once someone purchases with the card they’ve linked, GiftYa credits their account until they’ve spent the total amount in their GiftYa virtual wallet.

The best part? With this method, a GiftYa is usable at ANY business. Now, gift cards aren’t just acceptable at major chains; you can send giftcards for Starbucks or to the small cafe down the road. It’s even more widely accepted than a visa gift card!

SIMPLE GIFTS

It’s the thought that counts. Before, people only bought gift cards for holidays, birthdays, or other special occasions. Now, you can send a GiftYa for as little as $5. Know someone going for a job interview, send them a $5 GiftYa for a cup of coffee with a personalized Good Luck message. It can be used as a simple gift for graduation. Congratulate that new grad with a quick GiftYa for [something clever].

GiftYa does more than just make your e gift card experience easier. It also makes it more meaningful. When you send someone a GiftYa, you can make it a personalized photo gift by including a photo significant to the two of you. Or, send a video with a personalized message that shows how much you care.


HOW IT WORKS:

• Sending a GiftYa

Choose from almost any merchant, anywhere, select the amount you want to give, personalize your GiftYa with a photo or video and send it to your recipient’s phone within seconds.

• Receiving a GiftYa

Link the GiftYa you received to your credit or debit card in seconds, make a purchase as you normally would and your account is credited the amount you spend until the GiftYa is used in full.

FEATURES:• Thoughtful gift experience

GiftYa uses the technology that’s part of our everyday lives to send meaningful, personalized gifts in the moment.

• No more unused gift cards

$1 billion in gift cards go unused every year. GiftYa fixes that by linking the gift to the recipient’s credit or debit card so the gift can’t be lost and doesn’t go unused.

Love GiftYa?

Please take a moment to review our app! Your feedback is very important to us. GiftYa | The thought that counts

DOWNLOAD GiftYa today and become the most thoughtful egifter the world has ever seen!

Introducing GiftYa, the gifting app that allows you to send a gift card in a new way. Gift card apps similar to GiftYa often involve buying gift cards that either don’t work or never get sent to the right email. We’ve ensured these annoying problems don’t happen (and never do again!).

With GiftYa, you simply connect your credit/debit card and send gift cards (a GiftYa) to your friends and family through text. Unlike email, which can lead to mistaken identity in delivery, phone numbers are very difficult to get wrong. Once you send someone a GiftYa, they can link it to their credit/debit card in seconds. Once someone purchases with the card they’ve linked, GiftYa credits their account until they’ve spent the total amount in their GiftYa virtual wallet.

The best part? With this method, a GiftYa is usable at ANY business. Now, gift cards aren’t just acceptable at major chains; you can send giftcards for Starbucks or to the small cafe down the road. It’s even more widely accepted than a visa gift card!

SIMPLE GIFTS

It’s the thought that counts. Before, people only bought gift cards for holidays, birthdays, or other special occasions. Now, you can send a GiftYa for as little as $5. Know someone going for a job interview, send them a $5 GiftYa for a cup of coffee with a personalized Good Luck message. It can be used as a simple gift for graduation. Congratulate that new grad with a quick GiftYa for [something clever].

GiftYa does more than just make your e gift card experience easier. It also makes it more meaningful. When you send someone a GiftYa, you can make it a personalized photo gift by including a photo significant to the two of you. Or, send a video with a personalized message that shows how much you care.


HOW IT WORKS:

• Sending a GiftYa

Choose from almost any merchant, anywhere, select the amount you want to give, personalize your GiftYa with a photo or video and send it to your recipient’s phone within seconds.

• Receiving a GiftYa

Link the GiftYa you received to your credit or debit card in seconds, make a purchase as you normally would and your account is credited the amount you spend until the GiftYa is used in full.

FEATURES:• Thoughtful gift experience

GiftYa uses the technology that’s part of our everyday lives to send meaningful, personalized gifts in the moment.

• No more unused gift cards

$1 billion in gift cards go unused every year. GiftYa fixes that by linking the gift to the recipient’s credit or debit card so the gift can’t be lost and doesn’t go unused.

Love GiftYa?

Please take a moment to review our app! Your feedback is very important to us. GiftYa | The thought that counts

DOWNLOAD GiftYa today and become the most thoughtful egifter the world has ever seen!

With GiftYa, you simply connect your credit/debit card and send gift cards (a GiftYa) to your friends and family through text. Unlike email, which can lead to mistaken identity in delivery, phone numbers are very difficult to get wrong. Once you send someone a GiftYa, they can link it to their credit/debit card in seconds. Once someone purchases with the card they’ve linked, GiftYa credits their account until they’ve spent the total amount in their GiftYa virtual wallet.

The best part? With this method, a GiftYa is usable at ANY business. Now, gift cards aren’t just acceptable at major chains; you can send giftcards for Starbucks or to the small cafe down the road. It’s even more widely accepted than a visa gift card!

SIMPLE GIFTS

It’s the thought that counts. Before, people only bought gift cards for holidays, birthdays, or other special occasions. Now, you can send a GiftYa for as little as $5. Know someone going for a job interview, send them a $5 GiftYa for a cup of coffee with a personalized Good Luck message. It can be used as a simple gift for graduation. Congratulate that new grad with a quick GiftYa for [something clever].

GiftYa does more than just make your e gift card experience easier. It also makes it more meaningful. When you send someone a GiftYa, you can make it a personalized photo gift by including a photo significant to the two of you. Or, send a video with a personalized message that shows how much you care.

Unlike email, which can lead to mistaken identity in delivery, phone numbers are very difficult to get wrong. Once you send someone a GiftYa, they can link it to their credit/debit card in seconds. Once someone purchases with the card they’ve linked, GiftYa credits their account until they’ve spent the total amount in their GiftYa virtual wallet.

The best part? With this method, a GiftYa is usable at ANY business. Now, gift cards aren’t just acceptable at major chains; you can send giftcards for Starbucks or to the small cafe down the road. It’s even more widely accepted than a visa gift card!

It’s the thought that counts. Before, people only bought gift cards for holidays, birthdays, or other special occasions. Now, you can send a GiftYa for as little as $5. Know someone going for a job interview, send them a $5 GiftYa for a cup of coffee with a personalized Good Luck message. It can be used as a simple gift for graduation. Congratulate that new grad with a quick GiftYa for [something clever].

GiftYa does more than just make your e gift card experience easier. It also makes it more meaningful. When you send someone a GiftYa, you can make it a personalized photo gift by including a photo significant to the two of you. When you send someone a GiftYa, you can make it a personalized photo gift by including a photo significant to the two of you. • Sending a GiftYa

title: GiftYa - Virtual Gift Cards

creator: GiftYa LLC
descriptionHtml:
GiftYa The thought that counts! Let others know you are thinking of them when you send a GiftYa!

VIRTUAL GIFTS

Introducing GiftYa - the gift card app that allows you to send a gift card in a new way! From the makers of Giftcards.com, GifYa is an app that completely streamlines and simplifies the gift card gift-giving process! We have reinvented gift sharing to be more accessible, personalized, and thoughtful than ever! Gift card apps are often hit-or-miss. You buy gift cards that either don’t work or get sent to the wrong email. With GiftYa, we've made an app that ensures these irritating problems will never happen to you again! Become the ultimate e-gifter with GiftYa!

The process is simple. Connect your credit/debit card to GiftYa, and you can purchase gift cards (a GiftYa) and send them through text messages to your friends and family! Sending gift cards via email can lead to mistakes in delivery - phone numbers are easier to enter accurately and are less cluttered with messages. They are also more accessible for any technologically challenged people in your life. Anyone can receive a text and claim their gift card. Granny won’t have to reset her email password just to get her birthday gift this year! When you send someone mobile gift cards with GiftYa, they can link it to their credit/debit card in seconds. Once someone purchases with their linked card, GiftYa credits their account until they’ve spent the total amount in their GiftYa gift card wallet! Redeem GiftYa’s ANYWHERE you can use your card!

That’s the best part! With this method, a GiftYa is usable at ANY business. Gift cards aren't just for major chains anymore! You can use GiftYa to send giftcards to Starbucks or that small cafe down the road serving your friend's favorite chai latte. GiftYa is even more widely accepted than a Visa card! It is just that convenient!


SIMPLE GIFTS

Any occasion is a good time for a gift. Gift for whatever, whenever. Before, people bought gift cards for holidays, birthdays, and other special occasions. Now, you can send a GiftYa for as little as $5. If It’s the thought that counts, then let people know you are thinking of them! Know someone going for a job interview, send them a $5 GiftYa for a cup of coffee with a personalized Good Luck message. Congratulate that new grad with a quick GiftYa for whatever graduation shenanigans they have planned! Send something clever or cute to your sweetheart in the middle of their day just to let them know you’re thinking of them! GiftYa makes your e-gifts a breeze! Make your GiftYa more meaningful when set and send personalized card photos - Or send a video with a message that shows how much you care.



HOW IT WORKS:

• Sending a GiftYa

Choose from almost any merchant, select the amount you want to give, personalize your GiftYa with a photo or video and send it to your recipient’s phone within seconds.

• Receiving a GiftYa

Link the GiftYa you received to your credit or debit card in seconds, purchase as you usually would, and your account is credited the amount you spend until the GiftYa is completely used.

GET STARTED

Get started with GiftYa and make the thought count!

GiftYa uses the technology that’s part of our everyday lives to send meaningful, personalized gifts in the moment. $1 billion in gift cards go unused every year. GiftYa fixes that by linking the gift to the recipient’s credit or debit card so the gift can’t be lost and doesn’t go unused. No more unused gift cards.

Love GiftYa?

Please take a moment to review our app! Your feedback is very important to us.

GiftYa | The thought that counts

DOWNLOAD GiftYa today and become the most thoughtful e-gifter the world has ever seen!

Granny won’t have to reset her email password just to get her birthday gift this year! When you send someone mobile gift cards with GiftYa, they can link it to their credit/debit card in seconds. Once someone purchases with their linked card, GiftYa credits their account until they’ve spent the total amount in their GiftYa gift card wallet! Redeem GiftYa’s ANYWHERE you can use your card!

That’s the best part! With this method, a GiftYa is usable at ANY business. Gift cards aren't just for major chains anymore! You can use GiftYa to send giftcards to Starbucks or that small cafe down the road serving your friend's favorite chai latte. GiftYa is even more widely accepted than a Visa card! It is just that convenient!


SIMPLE GIFTS

Any occasion is a good time for a gift. Gift for whatever, whenever. Before, people bought gift cards for holidays, birthdays, and other special occasions. Now, you can send a GiftYa for as little as $5. If It’s the thought that counts, then let people know you are thinking of them! Know someone going for a job interview, send them a $5 GiftYa for a cup of coffee with a personalized Good Luck message. Congratulate that new grad with a quick GiftYa for whatever graduation shenanigans they have planned! Send something clever or cute to your sweetheart in the middle of their day just to let them know you’re thinking of them! GiftYa makes your e-gifts a breeze! Make your GiftYa more meaningful when set and send personalized card photos - Or send a video with a message that shows how much you care.



HOW IT WORKS:

• Sending a GiftYa

Choose from almost any merchant, select the amount you want to give, personalize your GiftYa with a photo or video and send it to your recipient’s phone within seconds.

• Receiving a GiftYa

Link the GiftYa you received to your credit or debit card in seconds, purchase as you usually would, and your account is credited the amount you spend until the GiftYa is completely used.

GET STARTED

Get started with GiftYa and make the thought count!

GiftYa uses the technology that’s part of our everyday lives to send meaningful, personalized gifts in the moment. $1 billion in gift cards go unused every year. GiftYa fixes that by linking the gift to the recipient’s credit or debit card so the gift can’t be lost and doesn’t go unused. No more unused gift cards.

Love GiftYa?

Please take a moment to review our app! Your feedback is very important to us.

GiftYa | The thought that counts

DOWNLOAD GiftYa today and become the most thoughtful e-gifter the world has ever seen!
